name: Masala Dosa
description: Crispy dosa filled with spiced mashed potatoes. Served with chutney and sambar.

name: Veg Puff
description: Flaky pastry filled with a spicy vegetable mix.

name: Idli with Sambar
description: Soft steamed rice cakes served with hot sambar and coconut chutney.

name: Chai (Tea)
description: Hot Indian-style milk tea with a blend of spices.

name: Aloo Paratha
description: Whole wheat flatbread stuffed with spicy mashed potatoes. Served with curd.

name: Paneer Roll
description: Indian flatbread rolled with paneer tikka and veggies.

name: Poha
description: Flattened rice cooked with spices, onions, and peanuts.
